sentences.en: A GaAs FET Oscillator stabilized by a dielectric resonator with a feedback loop has been developed.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了一种环路反馈式场效应管介质稳频振荡器.

sentences.en: A high temperature open resonator measuring system for low loss radome materials is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种测量低损耗天线罩材料的开腔高温自动测量系统.

sentences.en: A novel laser trimming method is developed for microwave ceramic dielectric resonator.
sentences.cn: 提出一种采用激光微调微波陶瓷介质谐振器的方法.

sentences.en: A novel spiral inductor resonator bandpass filter based on LTCC is proposed in this paper.
sentences.cn: 本文提出一种新型的基于低温共烧陶瓷技术(TCC) 螺旋电感带通滤波器.

sentences.en: Here we designed a miniature coaxial - cavity using stepped impedance resonator ( SIR ) as resonator element.
sentences.cn: 作者利用阶跃阻抗谐振器 ( SIR ) 作为谐振单元设计了一款小型化腔体梳状滤波器.

sentences.en: Playing out the sound through the guitar resonator is enhanced.
sentences.cn: 弹奏出来的声音会通过吉他的共鸣箱得到增强.

sentences.en: Quartz crystal, crystal oscillator, ceramic resonator, ceramic filter, saw filter, ceramic discriminator.
sentences.cn: 石英谐振器, 石英震荡器, 陶瓷谐振器, 陶瓷滤波器,声表面滤波器, 鉴频器.

sentences.en: Reaearch on mode selection theory of coupled resonator and single, double wave plate longitudinal - mode splitting theory.
sentences.cn: 研究耦合腔激光器的选模原理以及单 、 双波片纵模分裂原理.

sentences.en: Resonator in thermoacoustic engine system is always used to adjust the frequency.
sentences.cn: 在热声发动机系统中,谐振管用来调节系统的超振频率.

sentences.en: So in the resonator design process crystal blank, presents more challenging problems.
sentences.cn: 所以在实际的生产设计过程中, 提出了更高的要求.

sentences.en: Some form of resonator may be used to dissipate energy in an oscillating feed system.
sentences.cn: 某些形式的谐振器可用来耗散供应系统内的振荡能量.

sentences.en: The ceramic componets are made of high stability piezoelectric ceramics that functions as a mechanical resonator.
sentences.cn: 陶瓷元件由高稳定性压电陶瓷制成,其功能表现和机械谐振器一致.

sentences.en: The resonator ( astigmatic ) can be compensated by inserting a suitable thickness Brewster plate in the cavity.
sentences.cn: 在腔内插入一定厚度的布儒斯特片可以部分消除腔的像散.

sentences.en: This paper provides a thin - film resistor loaded microstrip ring resonator for the sub - structure of equalizer.
sentences.cn: 文章提出了一种薄膜电阻加载的微带环形谐振器均衡器子结构.

sentences.en: Under this condition , the input energy is entirely compensated for the loss of resonator.
sentences.cn: 在此条件下, 耦合进入谐振腔的能量完全用于补偿谐振腔能量的损耗.

words.tran_cn: 产生共鸣；回响（resonate 的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment that makes the sound of a musical instrument louder
